unprocessable.title: Failed to read credentials
unprocessable.text: Entered data is invalid. Please try again.

jwt_generation_err.title: Failed to process credentials
jwt_generation_err.text: Entered data is valid, but could not be processed. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.heading: Hakutest Dashboard
dashboard.address_tip: To ensure that your students can use Hakutest, open this address on their devices.

expired.title: Test has expired
expired.text: This test has expired and is no longer available. Please contact your teacher for details.

unprocessable.title: Failed to read data
unprocessable.text: Entered data is invalid. Please try again.

save_failed.title: Failed to write settings
save_failed.text: Entered data is valid, but could not be saved.

debug.label: Debug
debug.tip: Run Hakutest in debug mode, which allows to see more information in the logs.

disable_tray.label: Hide tray icon
disable_tray.tip: Run Hakutest without a system tray icon.

port.label: Port
port.tip: Port on which Hakutest server is started.

lang.label: Language
lang.tip: Language of the interface. Applied for both student and teacher interface.

overwrite_results.label: Overwrite results
overwrite_results.tip: Overwrite student results on test form resubmission.

show_results.label: Show results
show_results.tip: Show results to students immediately after test form is submitted.

results_directory.label: Save results into
results_directory.tip: Directory (folder) in which Hakutest stores student results.

tests_directory.label: Save tests into
tests_directory.tip: Directory (folder) in which Hakutest stores tests.

form.heading: Select the test for which statistics will be generated

unprocessable.title: Failed to read answers
unprocessable.text: Entered data is invalid. Please try again or contact your teacher.

save_failed.title: Failed to save answers
save_failed.text: Answers are not saved. Please try again or contact your teacher.

test_not_found.title: Test not found
test_not_found.text: The test you are requesting does not exist.

result.disabled: Result not displayed according to Hakutest settings. If you want to know the result, contact your teacher.
result.title: Your result

test.confirm: Are you sure you want to submit your answers?
